front.title: An Initial Quality of Service Policfor COPS-PR Clients and Serversy Information Base

abstract.t: This document defines a set of policy rule classes for describingquality of service (QoS) policies.This document structures QoS policy information as instances of policyrule classes. A policy rule class (PRC) is an ordered set of scalarattributes. Policy rule classes are arranged in a hierarchicalstructure similar to tables in SNMP's SMIv2 [SNMP-SMI]. As with SNMPtables, they are identified by a sequence of integer identifiers (anObject Identifier).
